list.title: fetchAll
list.description: Fetch all content for a specific brand and type with pagination, search, and grouping options.

list.title: fetchAllSongs
list.description: Fetch all songs for a specific brand with pagination and search options.

list.title: fetchArtists
list.description: Fetch all artists with lessons available for a specific brand.

list.title: fetchByRailContentId
list.description: Fetch content by a specific Railcontent ID.

list.title: fetchByRailContentIds
list.description: Fetch content by an array of Railcontent IDs.

list.title: fetchChildren
list.description: Fetch children content by Railcontent ID.

list.title: fetchFilterOptions
list.description: Fetch filter options for a specific brand.

list.title: fetchMethodChildren
list.description: Fetch all children of a specific method by Railcontent ID.

list.title: fetchMethodNextLesson
list.description: Fetch the next lesson for a specific method by Railcontent ID.

list.title: fetchNewReleases
list.description: Fetch the latest new releases for a specific brand.

list.title: fetchNextPreviousLesson
list.description: Fetch the next and previous lessons for a specific lesson by Railcontent ID.

list.title: fetchPackAll
list.description: Fetch all content for a specific pack by Railcontent ID.

list.title: fetchPackChildren
list.description: Fetch all children of a specific pack by Railcontent ID.

list.title: fetchRelatedLessons
list.description: Fetch related lessons for a specific lesson by Railcontent ID and type.

list.title: fetchRelatedSongs
list.description: Fetch related songs for a specific brand and song ID.

list.title: fetchSanity
list.description: Fetch data from the Sanity API based on a provided query.

list.title: fetchSongById
list.description: Fetch a song by its document ID from Sanity.

list.title: fetchSongCount
list.description: Fetch the total count of songs for a specific brand.

list.title: fetchUpcomingEvents
list.description: Fetch upcoming events for a specific brand.

list.title: fetchWorkouts
list.description: Fetch the latest workouts for the home page of a specific brand.
